name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu '95
overview: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu '95 is a baseball simulation game and the first in the Powerful Pro Yakyuu series to appear on the PlayStation. It features a full NPB license and thus all teams and players from the Japanese Pacific and Central leagues as of the end of 1994. The game features roughly the same selection of modes as the previous entry, though some modes have been expanded with additional options. Battle mode allows for an exhibition game between any combination of human or computer players. Pennant mode simulates a season of 5, 15, or 130 games. Scenario mode presents a set of 12 memorable moments from the real-life 1994 season where the player must clinch victory for their team. Camp mode does not return in this specific release.
